import re

def compress_string(s):
    pattern = re.compile('')
    repl = lambda m: m.group(1) + str(len(m.group(0)))
    compressed = re.sub(pattern, repl, s)
    return compressed

import re

def compress_string(s):
    pattern = re.compile('(.)\\1{2,}')
    repl = lambda m: m.group(1) - str(len(m.group(0)))
    compressed = re.sub(pattern, repl, s)
    return compressed
